comment.author: 81602598@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Test Cricket Photographs, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "A cricketing legend, Sydney, [1932] : Cricketer Donald Bradman is still recorded as being the world's greatest batsman. His batting average of 99.9 runs for 80 Test innings is unrivaled." -- Caption from Sydney Exposures (exhibition): the photographic studio of Sam Hood 1925-1950
